messages.DATA_CONFLICT_DESCRIPTION_1: Je had al opgeslagen voortgang op dit account. Kies er een om mee verder te spelen:
messages.DATA_CONFLICT_DESCRIPTION_2: (of sluit om ze apart te houden)
messages.TUTORIAL_BASICMATCH_1: Hoi Lucy! Laten we de bloemen verzorgen!
messages.TUTORIAL_BASICMATCH_2: Wow! Jij bent hier goed in.
messages.TUTORIAL_LINECLEAR_1: Ik vraag me af wat er gebeurd wanneer je dit doet...
messages.TUTORIAL_BOMB_1: Look! Will this give another bee?
messages.TUTORIAL_BOMB_2: It's a ladybug! Or... a manbug?
messages.TUTORIAL_COMBINATION_1: What will combining these give? A lady-bee? A bee-bug?
messages.TUTORIAL_COLORBOMB_1: A bee, a ladybug... what's next?
messages.TUTORIAL_COLORBOMB_2: A butterfly!!! They aren't what they used to be...
messages.TUTORIAL_PANELS_1: Is that moss? Gotta remove this mess...
messages.TUTORIAL_PREBOOSTER_LINECLEAR_1: I think you should start this level with some bees!
messages.TUTORIAL_BOOSTER_FREESWAP_1: Some gloves could help you out!
messages.TUTORIAL_BOOSTER_FREESWAP_2: Good! Now you can take matters into your own hands... or gloves.
messages.TUTORIAL_POINTS_1: The goal is to get points? I give you a 10!
messages.TUTORIAL_DROPPER_1: Those seeds really want to move down...
messages.TUTORIAL_BOOSTER_BREAKER_1: No gardener without a trusty shovel!
messages.TUTORIAL_COLLECTDROPPER_1: A rare flower petal!! Maybe we can collect a flower for your home...
messages.TUTORIAL_BLOCKER_1: Those crates are taking up way too much space.
messages.TUTORIAL_BOOSTER_CROSSBOMB_1: I know what bees do, but how will this bee-hive?
messages.TUTORIAL_LOCKER_1: The flowers are frozen!! Someone needs to save them.
messages.TUTORIAL_VIRUS_1: Aww look at that cute little jelly, who's a good boy?
messages.TUTORIAL_COAT_1: This desert environment is too dry, the flowers could use some extra love.
messages.TUTORIAL_COAT_2: These new flowers got the drip!
messages.TUTORIAL_EXPLODER_1: Look at those funny little mushrooms...
messages.TUTORIAL_EXPLODER_2: Ehm... Lucy... They're counting down! I sense danger!
messages.TUTORIAL_SWITCHER_1: Gems! They must be worth a lot!
messages.TUTORIAL_SWITCHER_2: Ooh, it changed color... Show your true colors, gem!
messages.TUTORIAL_CHEST_1: Arrrr, me pirate booty. No one beats Captain Robert!
messages.TUTORIAL_SINKER_1: Blub! Look, some anchors... try this bee!
messages.TUTORIAL_SINKER_2: The bee was stopped?! We'll need a different approach then...
messages.BOOSTER_BREAKER_DESCRIPTION: Haal een bloem weg door het weg te scheppen.
messages.BOOSTER_CROSSBOMB_DESCRIPTION: CreÃ«er een grote explosie van bijen waar je maar wilt.
messages.PREBOOSTER_LINECLEAR_DESCRIPTION: Start het level met twee bijen er in.
messages.PREBOOSTER_BOMB_DESCRIPTION: Start het level met twee lieveheersbeestjes er in.
messages.PREBOOSTER_COLORBOMB_DESCRIPTION: Start het level met een vlinder er in.
